title: Paseo del Prado to Sol
knownFor: Iconic Madrid landmarks including Cibeles fountain, Puerta de Alcalá, and the stunning Edificio Metrópolis. This walk takes you through the heart of Madrid's most photographed streets.
route: Start at Paseo del Prado → Cibeles fountain → Calle de Alcalá → Puerta de Alcalá → Continue to Sol (passing Edificio Metrópolis) → Sevilla station (Four Seasons Hotel) → Puerta del Sol
